mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UserLoginLog (ip_address, mac_address, host_name, gw_id, sys_id, is_success, login_time, password) VALUES (#{ip},#{mac}, #{host_name}, #{userGwId}, #{userSysId}, #{is_success}, getdate(), #{userPwd})
mapper.select: SELECT TOP (5) a.[seq_no], a.[is_success], a.[login_time] FROM [DSL].[dbo].[UserLoginLog] a where a.gw_id = #{userGwId} order by a.seq_no desc
